text:
*Senior Data Scientist в KPMG*
*Key responsibilities:*
•    Leading the design and delivery of Data Science and Big Data solutions for our clients
•    Leading teams of Junior Data Scientists and Data Wranglers on client engagements
•    Harvesting, cleansing, and processing data from different sources
•    Developing, testing, and validating predictive models
•    Implementing analytics as a service solutions for continuous data harvesting and model scoring
•    Supporting senior go-to-client professionals during client discussions with technical expertise

*Required skills:*
•    University degree (preferably in computer science or quantitative field)
•    Three or more years of experience working in the Data Science field
•    One or more years of experience leading delivery teams in the Data Science field
•    Advanced knowledge of data discovery, modelling, retrieval and profiling
•    Advanced knowledge of data mining, predictive modelling and statistics
•    Practical experience with programming and database languages (Python , R, SQL)
•    Practical experience with reporting and visualization tools (Power BI/QlikView/Tableau or similiar)
•    Strong analytical, numerical and programming skills
•    Excellent critical thinking and problem solving skills
•    Fluent in spoken and written English

*Nice to have skills:*
•    Experience with developing and implementing analytics as a service solutions
•    General knowledge of Big Data frameworks and tools (Hadoop, Spark, AWS, MS Azure)
•    General knowledge of systems architecture, data governance, and data management
•    Working experience in banking, insurance, telco, retail, energy and utilities
•    Project management certification (e.g. PRINCE2, Scrum Master)
•    PhD in the field of physics, math or computer science
Зп до 250т
HR <https://ru.linkedin.com/in/инна-анаева-36404252/en>
